data.persona: I am a rodent. A larger rodent. Commonly found at night, scavenging. nobody like me!
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passage.
A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
The juror is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am angered that the juror stepped on my tail
data.mid_motivation: I want the juror to give me food for his injustice
data.long_motivation: I plan to bite all humans that enter this hidden passage from now on because they are so disrespectful
